title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4601.2 - Validity of identification number
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4601.2 - Validity of identification number

State Regulations

The identification number shall be valid until suspended, revoked or surrendered. The commission may suspend the identification number of
any registered organization that has not been licensed to conduct games of
chance during 12 consecutive months and, should such suspension be imposed, the
organization concerned shall request reinstatement prior to making application
for a games of chance license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4601.2

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
